excerpt.rendered:
Indulge in modern luxury with the Sierra 4 Seater L-Shape Sofa. Its modular design offers versatile arrangements, ensuring both style and comfort. Plush cushions and premium materials make this sofa a statement piece for contemporary living.

Make the 4 Seater L-Shape Sofa your own and redefine your living space with a touch of contemporary luxury. Embrace the modular design, plush comfort, and enduring style—transform your home today.

  • After Sales Service: 1 Year
  • Color & Size: Selected By Customers
  • Product Life: Life Time
  • Original Invoice Must be presented at the time of Delivery Or Warranty Claim
Attribute Specification
Dimensions 9 ft by 6 ft (when assembled, all pieces)
Materials Kikkar Wood Frame (0.75 inches thick)
Configuration L-Shape, 5 Seater
Color Options Grey, Green, Beige, Black
Poshish Material Jute
Made To Order Yes

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
